name: Captain Vex
visual_description: A weathered woman in her late thirties, former Imperial officer now Deserter leader. Short-cropped gray-streaked dark hair, a burn scar across the left side of her face and neck. Hard eyes that have seen too much betrayal. Wears modified Imperial armor spray-painted with Deserter symbols. Moves with military precision.
reference_prompt: A battle-hardened woman in her late thirties stands in defiant command, her short-cropped dark hair streaked with premature gray. A severe burn scar runs from her left temple down her neck, the skin there tight and discolored. Her eyes hold cold fury and absolute determination. She wears modified Imperial power armor, its original insignia spray-painted over with crude Deserter symbols in red. Her posture speaks of military discipline turned to revolutionary purpose. Dramatic side lighting emphasizes the texture of her scar and the weathering on her armor, while casting half her face in determined shadow. Style: Military portrait, rebellion aesthetic. Mood: Vengeful, commanding, unbroken.
key_visual_elements: burn scar on left face and neck
origin: Former Imperial Captain who witnessed atrocities and defected
